markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Awakened Power](/Feats.aspx?ID=3778) <actions string="" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Gatewalkers</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Deviant" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=426" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gatewalkers Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=190) pg. 9, [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 100</row>

</column>

---

Your power spontaneously evolves or reconfigures itself. You gain one awakening benefit for a [deviant feat](/feats/deviant-feats) of 4th level or lower.

**Special** You can take this feat multiple times. Each time you do, choose a different deviant feat of 4th level or lower, and gain one of its awakening benefits.
name: Awakened Power
